name: Sako Sushi Yuki
description:
(Not yet complete.) 

Sako and Yuki work at their parent's rival sushi shops, but they won't let that animosity smother their romance, or will they? Help them keep their budding flame alive by navigating the delicate balance of their parents desires and the life they want.

(Full game Soon)
